cleaned_text: Lots of questions out there, particularly from US resident tourists. Hopefully these websites help. [Italy](/Tourism-g187768-Italy-Vacations.html)'s current entry regulations: [https://www.salute.gov.it/portale/nuovocoronavirus/dettaglioContenutiNuovoCoronavirus.jsp?lingua=english&id=5412&area=nuovoCoronavirus&menu=vuot](/ExternalLinkInterstitial?redirectTo=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.salute.gov.it%2Fportale%2Fnuovocoronavirus%2FdettaglioContenutiNuovoCoronavirus.jsp%3Flingua%3Denglish%26id%3D5412%26area%3DnuovoCoronavirus%26menu%3Dvuot) Entry info based on passport, origin and transit points, itinerary: [https://infocovid.viaggiaresicuri.it/index_en.html](/ExternalLinkInterstitial?redirectTo=https%3A%2F%2Finfocovid.viaggiaresicuri.it%2Findex_en.html) EU Green Pass: [https://ec.europa.eu/info/live-work-travel-eu/coronavirus-response/safe-covid-19-vaccines-europeans/eu-digital-covid-certificate_en](/ExternalLinkInterstitial?redirectTo=https%3A%2F%2Fec.europa.eu%2Finfo%2Flive-work-travel-eu%2Fcoronavirus-response%2Fsafe-covid-19-vaccines-europeans%2Feu-digital-covid-certificate_en) US CDC card acceptedin lieu of EU Green Pass [https://ambwashingtondc.esteri.it/ambasciata_washington/en/sala-stampa/dall_ambasciata/ingressi-in-italia-dagli-usa-e.html](/ExternalLinkInterstitial?redirectTo=https%3A%2F%2Fambwashingtondc.esteri.it%2Fambasciata_washington%2Fen%2Fsala-stampa%2Fdall_ambasciata%2Fingressi-in-italia-dagli-usa-e.html) And for Canadians: [https://ambottawa.esteri.it/ambasciata_ottawa/it/ambasciata/news/dall_ambasciata/2020/03/focus-coronavirus.html](/ExternalLinkInterstitial?redirectTo=https%3A%2F%2Fambottawa.esteri.it%2Fambasciata_ottawa%2Fit%2Fambasciata%2Fnews%2Fdall_ambasciata%2F2020%2F03%2Ffocus-coronavirus.html) (English translation button apparently not working but " certificazioni vaccinali e italiane" is what you need to know. Apologies to residents of Japan for my inability to find a government site specifically confirming acceptance of your country's vaccination certificate. For the dPLF required for each adult (minor children to be listed on the form of their accompanying adult): [https://app.euplf.eu/#/](/ExternalLinkInterstitial?redirectTo=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.euplf.eu%2F%23%2F) Help re completing the dPLF: User manual for help completing the dPLF: [https://www.salute.gov.it/imgs/C_17_pagineAree_5411_11_file.pdf](/ExternalLinkInterstitial?redirectTo=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.salute.gov.it%2Fimgs%2FC_17_pagineAree_5411_11_file.pdf) Italian National Tourism Authority guide to Covid-19 regulations: [http://www.italia.it/en/useful-info/covid-19-updates-information-for-tourists.html](/ExternalLinkInterstitial?redirectTo=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.italia.it%2Fen%2Fuseful-info%2Fcovid-19-updates-information-for-tourists.html) TA Italy forum "Coronavirus Situation" thread for daily updates re Italy's situation and updates:: [https://www.tripadvisor.com/ShowTopic-g187768-i20-k13238308-o10-Coronavirus_situation-Italy.html](http://www.tripadvisor.com/ShowTopic-g187768-i20-k13238308-o10-Coronavirus_situation-Italy.html) If anyone knows of other sites that are missing please share.
